title: The Widow I (Die Witwe I) from War (Krieg)

dimensions: composition (irreg.): 14 5/8 x 9 5/16" (37.2 x 23.6 cm); sheet (irreg.): 26 x 18 3/4" (66 x 47.7 cm)
